name: aloraichium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows Alola raichu to upgrade thunderbolt into stoked sparksurfer.
short_effect: Held: Allows Alola Raichu to upgrade Thunderbolt into Stoked Sparksurfer.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Alolan Raichu’s Thunderbolt to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Alolan Raichu’s Thunderbolt to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Alolan Raichu’s Thunderbolt to a Z-Move.
